code: import{identity}from'../util/identity';import{operate}from'../util/lift';import{createOperatorSubscriber}from'./OperatorSubscriber';export function skipLast(skipCount){return skipCount<=0?identity:operate(function(source,subscriber){var ring=new Array(skipCount);var seen=0;source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber,function(value){var valueIndex=seen++;if(valueIndex<skipCount){ring[valueIndex]=value;}else{var index=valueIndex%skipCount;var oldValue=ring[index];ring[index]=value;subscriber.next(oldValue);}}));return function(){ring=null;};});}
